scripts.report:build: npx tsc --project tsconfig.report.json && vite build --config vite.report.config
scripts.build: npm i ../../ && (rm -rf ../../build/vite-react-ts || true) && vite build && mv dist ../../build/vite-react-ts
scripts.safetest:ci:test: rm -f artifacts.json && OPT_URL=https://safetest-two.vercel.app/vite-react-ts OPT_CI=1 OPT_DOCKER=1 OPT_ARTIFACTS=artifacts.json npm run safetest -- --run --bail=5
scripts.process:ci: npx safetest add-artifact-info artifacts.json results.json && cp results.json ../../build/vite-react-ts/results.json
